articles.description: Filmmaker Anurag Kashyap recently expressed remorse about not spending enough time with his daughter Aaliyah Kashyap while she was growing up.
articles.content:
Filmmaker Anurag Kashyap recently admitted in an interview with Film Companion that he is scared of losing his loved ones, and regrets spending less time with his daughter Aaliyah Kashyap.
